Text.Page:
Gah! I come out here to hunt for relics, and the scholars I came for send word they're not interested anymore.

I've heard of collectors paying good coin for orcan necklaces, though. Trouble is, I'm not really...prepared for hunting {@LinkCreature:24#11#horned orcan berserkers}.

Speaking of which, want to make some extra money?

I get wares to sell, you get gold, the camp gets improved security, and the orcans feed the scorpions. Everybody's happy! What do you say?
Who knew orcans could make such pretty baubles? These should fetch a good price. Just a few more, and I'll be on my way to the coast. Here's your shareâ€”pleasure doing business!

Don't give me that. If you've made it this far, a few orcans aren't going to stop you.

Get back out there, and don't get too much blood on the jewelry!
